short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip series intro allows to automatically skip the intro of the series on Netflix and Disney Plus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skip tv movie series intro (for Netflix and Disney Plus). Just install the extension, and reload your browser, and it works out of the box. In case of issues, open it at https://github.com/rozzilla/skip-series-intro/issues
